verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Look across the world
And let us shine for you, Lord
The whole world is yours
And I want to live for you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
One thing I know
Is that you've changed my life
I give you my all
All you are is good

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Give you my heart
God it's only you I seek
Give you my praise
'Cause I believe in you

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Look across the world
And let us shine for you, Lord
The whole world is yours
And I want to live for you, O God

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
All that I know
Is that you've changed my life
I give you my all
And all you are is good

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Carry the lost
Make my prayer in this life real Carry my cross
Hold on 'til I see you

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Look across the world
And let us shine for you, Lord
The whole world is yours
And I want to live for you, O God

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
And I want to live
I want to love you more
I want to be used
Father in all of the world
May your word be heard
May it stay on my lips
To live what I speak
Until your kingdom come

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Look across the world
And let us shine for you
And let us shine for you

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Look across the world
And let us shine for you, Lord
The whole world is yours
And I want to live for you

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Look across the world
And let us shine for you, Lord
The whole world is yours

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
And I want to live for you
And I want to live for you
And I want to live for you
